name: Cube Shooter (Early build)
description:
Side scrolling game with some light puzzles in a world of cubes. You also control a cube. Each face of the cube has a different power. They are useful. It's also in space, because space is cool.

I recommend checking out the How to Play section and playing the Free Play mode to get a feel for how the game works before jumping in to the main game.

This game is a work in progress. Currently there is a Free Play mode, and two levels (subject to change) in the main game. I will update with more levels as I make them, with more enemy types and powers. As you'll notice, two of the cube faces  don't have any powers. If you have any ideas for what they could be, as well as other ideas for enemy types, obstacles, light puzzle ideas etc (or a better title), please let me know in the comments.
